synopsis.text:
While the prestigious Seidou High School baseball team boasts a roster of one hundred passionate players, each with their own aspirations and trials, the spotlight often falls on the Ace. Among these hopefuls, Ryousuke Kominato stands out for his exceptional fielding abilities and commanding presence, forming a formidable defensive duo with Youichi Kuramochi. In this special OVA series, the moving, untold story of the Kominato brothers unfolds, revealing a bond that transcends the baseball field.

As Ryousuke returns home after a lengthy absence, he reconnects with his younger brother, Haruichi, who idolizes him and shares his love for baseball. Meanwhile, Youichi's journey to Seidou High is explored, showcasing his transformation from a mischievous troublemaker to a vital team member. Additionally, the first-year experiences of Norifumi Kawakami at Seidou High are brought to light.

At the heart of the team, Eijun Sawamura, an ambitious pitcher, and the renowned catcher, Kazuya Miyuki, strive to lead Seidou High to the esteemed Koushien championships. Through dedication and perseverance, these players chase their dreams, weaving a tale of camaraderie, rivalry, and personal growth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
